Text:
No such thing as 1.1.0
Latest on their website is 1.0.5

it is VLC 1.1.0-pre1 build, with lot of bugs.

http://forum.videolan.org/viewtopic.php?f=34&t=75010
.
Its 20mb and standalone, try it out, if you like it use it if not trash it. Never had a problem with it yet, post here or on the forums if you do though.
